scripts.debug: sam build && sam local start-api --docker-network logicful --env-vars dev/local-env.json -d 23451 --debugger-path debug --debug-args "-delveAPI=2"
scripts.deploy:staging: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 sam build && sam deploy --stack-name logicful-staging -no-confirm-changeset
scripts.sqs:formSubmission: node dev/events/sqs/sqs.js && sam local invoke -e dev/events/sqs/form_submission.json --docker-network logicful --env-vars dev/local-env.json FormSubmissionQueueHandler
scripts.sqs:formSubmissionDelete: node dev/events/sqs/sqs.js && sam local invoke -e dev/events/sqs/form_submission.json --docker-network logicful --env-vars dev/local-env.json FormSubmissionDeleteQueueHandler
